author: Zack Whittaker
title: Bugcrowd raises $30M in Series D to expand its bug bounty platform
description: Bug bounty and vulnerability disclosure platform Bugcrowd has raised $30 million in its Series D funding round. The San Francisco-headquartered company said the round brings the total amount raised to $80 million since the company was founded in 2011. This la…
content:
Bug bounty and vulnerability disclosure platform Bugcrowd has raised $30 million in its Series D funding round.
The San Francisco-headquartered company said the round brings the total amount raised to $80 million since the company was founded in 2011. This l… [+2327 chars]
